SEARCH
Package game.actors.enemies

Interface RunesRewarder

All Known Implementing Classes:
CanisLupus, Crustacean, Enemy, GiantCrab, GiantCrayfish, GiantDog, HeavySkeletalSwordsman, LoneWolf, PileOfBones, SkeletalBandit, Skeleton
public interface RunesRewarder
A RunesRewarder interface represents a kind of objective that a source of runes in the Elden Ring game can have. It gives promises to every source of runes such that their classes implementing this interface should have also implemented these two methods in this interface. This interface is crucial so that if a source of runes is killed by the player, then the amount of their dropped runes can be rewarded to the player. Their minimum and maximum amount of runes to be rewarded could be access via the implementation of these two specific methods. Created by:
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Che'er Min Yi, Chong Ming Sheng, Lam Xin Yuan

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    getMaxRewardRunes()
    Retrieve the maximum runes amount that can be rewarded to the player from the runes source.
    int
    getMinRewardRunes()
    Retrieve the minimum runes amount that can be rewarded to the player from the runes source.
